habitat.terrain: Dense woodland with towering ancient trees

distinctive_features: Long, graceful tails that shimmer in the dark

abilities.primary: Light manipulation, allowing them to create illusions
abilities.limitations: Vulnerable to shadows and darkness, which can diminish their powers

behavior.patterns: Nocturnal, with activity peaking at dusk and dawn
behavior.social_structure: Live in tight-knit flocks led by an elder Lumisylph

lore.origin_story: Born from the first light of the Elder Sun, Lumisylphs were guardians of the forest's magic.

legends.title: The Dance of the Northern Lights
legends.summary: A tale of how the Lumisylphs danced under the sky to repel the darkness, creating the mesmerizing aurora.
